TopicTitle: Kraken Attack on Polar Minmus Sci Station.

Articles.Content:
I have just made great landed Sci Station on North Pole of Minmus. It looks great and has light 24/7

But one of my kerbonautes fall from stairs head down. and Boom! Empty Galaxy, few times reload game with same empty galaxy, and at last i see parts of my station flying somewhere out of Kerbin SOI.

Now i see why ppl are afraid of Kraken ) 

I play on hard diff, and looks like it is good idia to save game few times a day and then manualy rename saves if such happens.
Yes, some of these bugs are really hard to weed out, this one has existed for a while now. Get hyperedit and remake your save, or the important bits, anyway.

> 
> looks like it is good idia to save game few times a day and then manualy rename saves if such happens.

ALT+F5 to name your saves
SOunds like you got hit by the Hell Kraken.

> 
> ALT+F5 to name your saves

yes, and u have to rename this save to "persistent.sfs" to load it playing hard diff
Mr. NaN has reached you too? This may be getting a little expansive...
had that last night as well, when your kerbal falls through the terrain your save is corrupted. hope you made a recent backup!

Had this happen in .25 on the moon quite often, especially when my kerbals fell and slid. Having a backup is good.
See, this is why I stick to the Flats... I go through far fewer pallets of Kraken-B-Gone.
+1 Kerbonaut fell under ground. it brokes all idia of playing without save games...
